CatDescriptText: Mrs. Esther Hines, 1529 Sedgwick Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 14, 1958, pg. 8 with question: �Do you think ministers should invest in business enterprises for profit, or become executives or directors of such concern?� answer reads: �I don�t think that it�s any good. It seems to me as though it will conflict with his duties.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Esther Hines, wearing hat with flower embellishment, eyeglasses, short sleeve dress with floral lace collar, and dark patterned belt, standing on Penn Avenue across the street from the Stanley Theatre, Downtown
